name: Friday Night Funkin' x Red
description:
Friday Night Funkin' x Red is a high-quality fan-made mod for the music rhythm game Friday Night Funkin'. Find yourself in a mysterious dimension battling against Red, a demonic trickster sent by Girlfriend's dad, and do your best to outsing that sinister creature.

The downloadable version of the mod, on which this port is based, is available here. All the credit goes to 4NO3.

P.S. The port may not work properly on Chrome for Mac OS. Use Safari instead.
